Text.Value:
ALLIES? -- there is US --
there is NOT us --
there is YOU
Once I get the third stone, I will be your new master.
So, where do we stand? What happens next?
My intention is to destroy you, not to help  you.
Wait, you control the Steel Watchers now? The Absolute brain?
What if I'm charged with killing Gortash? That would be inconvenient.
Elder brain? You... seem less hostile.
If you talk like that, everyone will know something is wrong with the Steel Watch.
If the Watchers aren't hostile, it should be easy to take out their foundry. Shouldn't it?

ONLY you--
Greetings citizen. How can the Steel Watch help you?
-- WE HELP EACHOTHER-

Synopsis: After Gortash's death (but before Orin's) the elder brain is communicating through the Steel Watchers. This is the dialog on all steel watchers during this phase.
